subject: Simsonn Manager 2.0.7 Bugs
description_text:
Hi there,

Just purchased a set of your Simsonn Pro Plus X pedals. They're amazing!
That being said the latest version of Simsonn Manager 2.0.7 needs some bug
fixing.

Windows 11, latest 24H2 build 26100.4351.

The bugs I've found and can continually replicate with your 2.0.7 software
are:
1. The software does not auto launch on Windows startup, despite being
checked in the settings:
[image: image.png]

2. Everytime you load the software it does not remember the profile
assigned to a game and just says "Not Selected" even if you select one and
exit the software, it won't remember it and be set to "Not Selected" again
next time.
[image: image.png]

3. If I choose a different curve graph for my clutch and click save to a
profile, it won't remember that graph next time you load the software and
profile, and just goes back to a linear graph. Here's the graph I can't get
to save and stick to the saved profile:
[image: image.png]


Thanks so much for your help and fixing all these bugs in your latest
software! Please let me know once you've addressed all these issues so I
can test them out.
Travis

conversations.body_text: Hi Travis,  Thank you very much for your feedback. We will immediately arrange for our engineers to fix the issue and provide you with version 2.0.8 as soon as possible.
Hi Travis,  Hello, we’ve released version 2.0.8. You can download it from our official website and give it a try.
